source.sqlReaderQuery: select max(ModifiedDate) as lastmodifieddate from SalesLT.Customer

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from SalesLT.Customer where ModifiedDate > '@{activity('HW_VALUE').output.firstRow.HWdate}' and ModifiedDate <= '@{activity('Get_last_Date_modified').output.firstRow.lastmodifieddate}'

select * from SalesLT.@{pipeline().parameters.TableName} where ModifiedDate > '@{activity('HW_VALUE').output.firstRow.HWdate}' and ModifiedDate <= '@{activity('Get_last_Date_modified').output.firstRow.lastmodifieddate}'
select HWdate from dbo.HWtable where TableName = '@{pipeline().parameters.TableName}'
@if(equals(item(),'Customer'),'SELECT * FROM SalesLT.Customer where CustomerID > 100 and CustomerID < 1000' , 'SELECT * FROM SalesLT.Product where ProductID > 100')

items.value: @createArray('SELECT * FROM SalesLT.Customer where CustomerID > 100 and CustomerID < 1000' , 'SELECT * FROM SalesLT.Product where ProductID > 100')

sink.preCopyScript:
if EXISTS (select 1 from sys.objects where name = 'Customer_copy')
BEGIN
TRUNCATE TABLE SalesLT.Customer_copy
END

source.sqlReaderQuery:
WITH cte AS (
select concat(a.FirstName,a.LastName) as Customer_name , b.AddressID as addressid from saleslt.Customer a 
LEFT join  saleslt.CustomerAddress b
on a.CustomerID = b.CustomerID)
SELECT cte.Customer_name , 
case when b.AddressID IS NOT NULL THEN concat(b.AddressLine1,b.AddressLine2)  
ELSE 'Adress not updates' end as Customer_address from cte 
left join SalesLT.Address b
ON cte.addressid = b.AddressID
